about_the_game:
Your choices will shape the fate of the people who inhabit this gray realm. Engage in pulse-pounding battles that will challenge even the most seasoned of warriors. Harness your reflexes, strategy, and mastery of combat as you clash with relentless foes, each encounter bringing you closer to becoming a legend.Embark on a captivating journey through diverse and meticulously crafted environments. Uncover hidden treasures, unravel the mysteries of the world, and forge alliances with intriguing characters who will aid or hinder your path to glory.
Will you lend a helping hand to those in need, offering a glimmer of hope amidst the darkness? Or will you succumb to the temptation of power and riches, leaving a trail of chaos in your wake?

Harness your reflexes, strategy, and mastery of combat as you clash with relentless foes, each encounter bringing you closer to becoming a legend.Embark on a captivating journey through diverse and meticulously crafted environments. Uncover hidden treasures, unravel the mysteries of the world, and forge alliances with intriguing characters who will aid or hinder your path to glory.
Will you lend a helping hand to those in need, offering a glimmer of hope amidst the darkness? Or will you succumb to the temptation of power and riches, leaving a trail of chaos in your wake?
name: The Elder Tales

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel pentium
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8 Card
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel pentium
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8 Card
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Prepare for a challenging adventure in this oldschool 2D action-RPG. Experience the nostalgic charm of retro graphics combined with modern gameplay solutions. With low computer requirements, immerse yourself in an intriguing story and explore a world filled with endless activities.
